name: Amplify Energy Corp.
description: Amplify Energy Corp. is an exploration and production company focused on acquiring and developing oil and gas resources in the United States. Founded in 2017 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Amplify is committed to delivering sustainable energy solutions while maximizing value for its shareholders. The company primarily operates in the offshore and onshore regions of the Gulf Coast, focusing on mature production assets that offer significant upside potential through operational efficiencies and enhanced recovery techniques. Amplify leverages advanced technologies and expertise in engineering to optimize production and reduce costs, ensuring that it remains competitive in the ever-evolving energy sector. The company is dedicated to environmental stewardship and aims to operate responsibly by minimizing its carbon footprint and investing in renewable energy initiatives. Amplify Energy Corp. is listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol 'AMPS' and is actively engaged in capitalizing on opportunities within the energy market to drive growth and profitability.
